text: chea karpit nasa a l laoh banlyy nouv peakyasaamdei puok ( yeahou ti) del ban niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh chea anak kreikr haey puok yeung kuchea anak mean . yeung( a l laoh)nung kttra nouv peakyasaamdei robsa puokke ning kar samleab robsa puokke champoh banda na pi daoy a you tde thmr haey yeung nung banhchea tha chaur puok anak phloksa rosacheate tearounakamm( phleung nork) del chabcheh choh
